name: backdoor golf
description:
Backdoor Golf (aka Whacky Golf) is a small 2D golf game made in two days for the Assembly Summer 2016 game dev compo.

Controls:

Hold D - Charge Shot

Release D - Take Shot

Space - Change Club

Tab - Mute Music & Sounds

How To Play:

Hit the ball past the right side of the screen to progress to the next stage. Hitting it through the "Target" area will get you more points and a time bonus.

Your club decides the angle you hit the ball at. You have three clubs to choose from; A driver, wedge and a putter. These can be switched between using tab

Credits:

Music:

  • "Off to Osaka" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Fonts:

  • "Airplane" by Kady Jesko (kadyje.com)
  • "m5x7" by Daniel Linssen (managore.itch.io)
  • "04B_25_" & "04B_03B_" by 04 (04.jp.org)

If you have any questions or issues let me know
